hints.content: So on the number line, we start at $64$ and move **right** $\purpleD{10}$ and then $\maroonD9$ more.

This number line shows $64 + 19$:

![A number line starts at 64 with plus 10 and goes to 74. From 74 plus 9 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c5c5738faefd8a0a1616c1bf4d99de68e964729c)

choices.content: ![A number line starts at 64 with plus 10 and goes to 74. From 74 plus 9 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c5c5738faefd8a0a1616c1bf4d99de68e964729c)
![A number line starts at 19 with plus 10 and goes to 29. From 29 plus 9 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/cb169bd456d103ed819f339df5375c2d78aa26e6)
![A number line starts at 64 with plus 1 and goes to 65. From 65 plus 9 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/88860967eb85ef6a080c9db74ead4fcc7b220981)
